code: public void testThreadInfo() {     // Threads that are part of a node get the node name     String nodeName = randomAlphaOfLength(5).     String threadName = EsExecutors.threadName(nodeName, randomAlphaOfLength(20)) + "[T#" + between(0, 1000) + "]".     assertEquals(nodeName, threadInfo(threadName)).     // Test threads get the test name     assertEquals(getTestName(), threadInfo(Thread.currentThread().getName())).     // Suite initialization gets "suite"     assertEquals("suite", suiteInfo).     // And stuff that doesn't match anything gets wrapped in [] so we can see it     String unmatched = randomAlphaOfLength(5).     assertEquals("[" + unmatched + "]", threadInfo(unmatched)). }
